titles.title: Offshore Wind Power Act of 2010
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend the 30 percent investment tax credit for offshore wind facilities.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 7/19/2010--Introduced. Offshore Wind Power Act of 2010 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a 30% energy investment tax credit for qualified offshore wind energy property for periods ending before January 1, 2017. Defines "qualified offshore wind energy property" as property which uses wind to generate electricity and is located in the coastal waters of the United States or the Great Lakes.
